internet-dot-org.title: Internet.org
internet-dot-org.description: In early 2015, Facebook launched its Internet.org initiative, a campaign to bring the web to parts of the world that don't have internet access. B-Reel helped introduce the project to the world with a site that emphasized accessibility and the mobile experience. To ensure the widest possible browser support, we created 5 different sites - a full featured site experience for modern desktop browsers, a full featured site for modern smartphones, a limited site for outdated desktop browsers, a light mobile experience for legacy smart phones, and a bare bones mobile site for old phones with limited capabilities.

mainContent.description: One of our biggest challenges was bringing animation, like a spinning globe, and inline videos to mobile browsers.
